1. Target platforms
===================

Delphi 2.0
Delphi 3.0
Delphi 4.0


2. Description
==============

Load TIFF 6.0 from file into TBitmap

Structure TFileTiff    contains TIFF-file related information.
Structure TGraphicTiff contains the graphic information for every 
image within the TIFF file.



3. Installation
===============

Nothing to install. Compile and run the program.

5. Known bugs & problems
========================

This software reads uncompressed
Bilevel, GrayScale, ColorPalet and RGBFullColor Images

If you need another kind of TIFF format, feel free to
implement it and send your code back to
krug@sdm.de
